China coal mine accident kills at least 8, rescue ops underway - XinhuaRescue operations were underway after eight people died and 15 missing following an accident in a coal mine in the city of Pingdingshan, central China's Henan Province on Friday, state news agency Xinhua reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:39:24 GMT 2AR4H32NMZN7ZCOPQ4DSXGFLX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rescue-underway-chinese-coal-mine-accident-leaves-ateast-8-dead-xinhua-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
China urges better financing coordination for housing sectorChina's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 12:40:54 GMT FAFZLMFKKRO6LPJ6TCO7PTNNHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-urges-better-financing-coordination-housing-sector-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
China's 2023 bank lending at record high, but economy still strugglingNew bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:26:26 GMT B26ZCDHZ3FKGTKLJVXURHTWL5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-2023-bank-lending-record-high-economy-still-struggling-2024-01-12/Judy Hua, Kevin Yao市场亚洲市场
In moon race with China, U.S. setbacks test role of private firmsTwo U.S. setbacks this week in the race to the moon with China illustrate the risks of NASA's plans to bet on a new strategy of relying heavily on private companies. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:08:41 GMT 2BACK DUZM5RPNVLCZLCTSE6M https://www.reuters.com/science/moon-race-with-china-us-setbacks-test-role-of-private-firms-2024-01-12/Joey Roulette, Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Ryan Woo科学
Weak demand, tighter lenders: Hong Kong property developers face tough 2024Hong Kong's property companies face a squeeze in 2024 from rising funding costs and sluggish home sales and office rentals, making creditors and investors cautious about developers’ financial health. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 08:02:24 GMT VGPQ3GR3HRP4PGJC2RSHD5WTB4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/weak-demand-tighten-lenders-hong-kong-property-developers-face-tough-2024-2024-01-12/Clare Jim市场亚洲市场
China media warns against taking China's Indian Ocean research as threatsChinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:51:19 GMT AOQP3UMTK5JW5DGBLJNI3RVP3E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-media-warns-against-china-take-indian-ocean-research-threats-2024-01-12/Greg Torode世界亚太地区
